segments.text: This little wooden stick is called a tee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you do with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For the first drive , put the golf ball on the tee , and push the tee into the ground .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pick up a wood and hold it like this , interlocking your fingers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Position yourself , swinging the club , watch the ball and hit it as hard as you can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not too bad . The goal is to get the ball into the hole with as few hits as possible .
segments.speaker: S1
